visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'column', chart title is 'Monthly Rainfall Data', axes and labels styling includes specific colors and font sizes, data series includes monthly rainfall data, custom colors are provided, and additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart displaying monthly rainfall data. The chart title is set to 'Monthly Rainfall Data' with a specified color and font size. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the unit of measurement as 'Rainfall (mm)'. Both axes have styled labels with defined colors and font sizes. The data series includes the monthly rainfall values, with a custom color applied to the columns. Additional configurations include enabling the legend, setting the chart background color, and defining specific margins to ensure the chart layout is visually balanced.
